WRITING.TITLE: Does anyone on this sub watch American Crime?
WRITING.TEXT:
NOT American Crime Story.
American Crime is also a crime anthology. But it's not based off of true stories. The first two seasons have been amazing. Each season showed all the different perspectives of a single crime. I'm desperately hoping it gets a third season.
It seems like no one on this sub watches it. I didn't think it'd be popular. But I thought I'd see it mentioned once or twice.

I don't wanna hate Family Guy because Seth McFarlane seems like a cool guy. But the show sucks.
But I still watch Family Guy. It's easy to put on in the background while I'm doing something.
